alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Lenawee; Livingston; Monroe; Oakland; Shiawassee; Washtenaw; Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 9:23PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of western Monroe, western Wayne, eastern Lenawee, southwestern Oakland, Shiawassee, Livingston, southwestern Genesee and Washtenaw Counties through 1030 PM EDT... At 923 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from near Potterville to near Chelsea to near Toledo. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Chelsea around 930 PM EDT. Dexter and Gregory around 935 PM EDT. Pinckney and Petersburg around 940 PM EDT. Hamburg and Ida around 950 PM EDT. Brighton around 955 PM EDT. Maybee around 1000 PM EDT. Hartland around 1005 PM EDT. Milford around 1010 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Whittaker, Plainfield, Hudson Mills Metropark, New Boston, Ridgeway, Delhi Mills, Palmyra, Pleasant Lake, Rose Center and Conway Township. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Genesee; Lenawee; Livingston; Monroe; Oakland; Shiawassee; Washtenaw; Wayne
